title: CLIENT VERSION 6.6.16_03_24_18_32 IS REJECTED BY SERVER HELP!
body:
I've been trying to sign in but everytime i press sign in it comes up with ... 
> **CLIENT VERSION 6.6.16_03_24_18_32 IS REJECTED BY SERVER HELP!******{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: i have this problem too!!!help plz!
I have the same problem and i need help

**HOW TO FORCE A REPATCH:**
Go to your Riot Games folder (Default path: C:/Riot Games/League of Legends)
Open the following directory:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\{highest version number}
Delete the following files:
- releasemanifest 
- S_OK
Open the Deploy folder
Delete the following folders/files:
- lib (folder) 
- META-INF (folder) 
- mod (folder) 
- lolclient.exe (file) 
- lolclient.swf (file) 
- locale.properties (file)
Restart League of Legends


Try this. Worked for me.

Source: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4{{champion:21}} {{summoner:31}}

Solve the problem the game don't open!!
what is this problem

Hey everyone,

Simply [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) should resolve this issue, if it does not, please let me know.
Thanks so much, this worked perfectly for me :)

Hello all,

Sometimes the client doesn't update correctly and locks people out as a result. My advice would be to start with [forcing a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4) and then moving on[ to a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5). 

Let me know how it goes,
PRIMAL
This same thing is happening with me, every time I try to log in this same message pops up.
